item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, May 18, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:

11. What Every Programmer Should Know About Enumerative Combinatorics (45 points | 20 comments)

27. Mexican Navy ship crashes into Brooklyn Bridge leaving two people dead (109 points | 61 comments)
28. Understanding Transformers via N-gram Statistics (103 points | 11 comments)
29. Show HN: Chat with 19 years of HN (27 points | 14 comments)
30. O2 VoLTE: locating any customer with a phone call (291 points | 64 comments)
